channel.title: Where can i get a cheap LCD/Plasma TV from? (UK)
channel.description:
Yea.. got my 21st coming up.. looking into buying maybe a 40inch + LCD or plasma for cheap.
I want it brand new, That way i know how its been treated (kinda)
probably got £400-500... If i can get a bigger tv for that money that will do too.

item.title: Where can i get a cheap LCD/Plasma TV from? (UK)
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

Im wanting to use it in conjunction with my xbox 360

Read full topic
item.source: Where can i get a cheap LCD/Plasma TV from? (UK)

item.title: Where can i get a cheap LCD/Plasma TV from? (UK)
item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.description:
@lawl wrote:

Radeon:

If you’ll be watching anything in HD get an LCD. However if you’re going to be mainly watching regular TV, get a plasma.

i have a 54" plasma at home and its amazing for hd

the deciding factor should be whether or not you want to use it for gaming/computer stuff aside from just tv, because if so, lcd is much better

Read full topic
item.source: Where can i get a cheap LCD/Plasma TV from? (UK)

item.title: Where can i get a cheap LCD/Plasma TV from? (UK)
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

It might sound silly but supermarkets like Tesco sometimes have some pretty good deals on.

Read full topic
item.source: Where can i get a cheap LCD/Plasma TV from? (UK)

item.title: Where can i get a cheap LCD/Plasma TV from? (UK)
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

A few years ago I bought a Mitsubishi DLP TV, which isn’t small enough to hang on the wall or anything, but it gives a good picture and supports 1080p, and they are always cheaper than LCD or Plasma TVs as well. I’m not even sure they still make them though.

Read full topic
item.source: Where can i get a cheap LCD/Plasma TV from? (UK)

item.source: Where can i get a cheap LCD/Plasma TV from? (UK)

item.title: Where can i get a cheap LCD/Plasma TV from? (UK)
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

We get all our TVs from soundandvision.co.uk, except we usually go to the store (they only have one I think) and get pretty awesome deals. They will generally do price matches etc but they used to be cheaper than pretty much anywhere else - I’m not sure what the situation is now though.

ebuyer might have a few cheeky deals on too.

Read full topic
item.source: Where can i get a cheap LCD/Plasma TV from? (UK)

item.title: Where can i get a cheap LCD/Plasma TV from? (UK)

item.description:

Not really bothered about freeview as i get sky from my xbox.

item.title: Where can i get a cheap LCD/Plasma TV from? (UK)
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.source: Where can i get a cheap LCD/Plasma TV from? (UK)

item.title: Where can i get a cheap LCD/Plasma TV from? (UK)
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

I’m from Aus, when deals are on you would be looking at $400-$600 AUD for a good, 50 inch LCD/plasma so I don’t think you should be paying as much as you expect to. £400-500 is plenty.

Have you looked online? Just go into your local electronics stores and haggle the prices.

Read full topic
